description: A hiking guidebook for visitors or locals who want to explore one of Canada's most scenic natural environments. This guidebook covers hikes in beautiful Kananaskis Country on the eastern slopes of the Canadian Rockies. It features a wide range of choices for day trippers looking for unique and irresistible views throughout this world-renowned mountain range. From easy, short day walks to ridgewalks - with a pitch or two of easy scrambling - there is something in this volume for everyone. The second edition features a fresh design and the most current route updates.
name: Popular Day Hikes Kananaskis Country 2nd Edition
